nl.tudelft.jpacman.strategy

Class AStarPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.strategy.AStar<Square>
      • nl.tudelft.jpacman.strategy.AStarPath

  • public class AStarPath
extends AStar<Square>
    A* algorithm implementation to compute the shortest path.
